pr_title: Moved NUI into a separate library

timeline.message: Initial removal of NUI code (moved to library).
Moved Border class to TeraNUI.
Fixed UI Tabbing.

Fixed compile error with TeraEd facade.

An import statement was removed in a previous commit that was needed.
Moved org.terasology.reflections to another library.
Fixed sound on button click and an engine test.
Fixed engine tests.

Re-implemented drawing meshes on UI (fix for Inventory module).

NUI does not expose this functionality anymore, so it is instead re-directed to Terasology's implementation via CanvasUtility, as CanvasImpl does not have an @API annotation (it is a private API).
Removed usage of Terasology input (entity-system) events in NUI.
Re-added support for rendering materials to canvas via CanvasUtility.
Re-added UIDeltaFormat (as it implies a JSON file format, like UIFormat).
Fixed compile errors and removed duplicate FontColor and FontUnderline classes (moved to NUI).
Added some additional methods removed from Canvas to CanvasUtility.
Moved CanvasImpl (as well as its associated classes) to NUI.
Merge branch 'nui-extraction' of https://github.com/BenjaminAmos/Terasology into BenjaminAmos-nui-extraction
fix: reintroduce rendering/dag files, fix import issues
Fix imports
Fix issues related to Joml vector conversion
Add utility functions for rectangle conversion to JomlUtil
Fix issues related to Joml rectangle conversion
